ygData.subject: Katheryn with a response!
ygData.msgSnippet: I wanted to respond to an e-mail that I just read this morning about rude people who play EQ. I, for one, have experienced a few rude people, however, I think
ygData.messageBody:
I wanted to respond to an e-mail that I just read this morning about rude people who play EQ. I, for one, have experienced a few rude people, however, I think this is to be expected. Out of all the individuals who play EQ, there are bound to be some people who just don't interact well with others (why they are playing a "role-playing" game is beyond me....but that's really not my business.) There are times when I play that I come across people who don't wish to interact and that's ok with me. I just avoid them or move on to greener pastures. :-) By far, I have met more nice people then rude ones. I have a friends list a mile long and I am sure that it will continue to grow!! I have had times when people in the game make me angry (by stealing a kill etc...) but alls fair in love and war..so they say! :-) So, relax and enjoy the game...don't worry about people who are rude or don't respond well to "role-playing." EQ is far too fun to let a few individuals ruin it for you!!!

One more thing....AND I HOPE SOMEONE CAN HELP ME!!

Does anyone know what to do with Rondo Dunfire's Tongue????? I have killed Rondo a couple of times and I have two tongues. I have done some light reasearch via the internet etc...but I can't seem to find a quest having to do with this item. If anyone knows anything about Rondo's Tongue...please let me know. I would appreciate it (if it's trash..I will just throw it away!!!).

Thanks....

Katheryn
Bristlebane Server
